events.name: TemperatureAlertIssued
events.description: To notify users when the cold chain temperature goes outside acceptable limits.

events.name: HumidityAlertIssued
events.description: To notify users when humidity levels deviate from safe thresholds.

events.name: ColdChainMonitoringFailed
events.description: To register instances where monitoring has failed, impacting operations.

events.name: NotificationAcknowledged
events.description: For users to confirm that they have received and acknowledged alerts.

commands.name: IssueTemperatureAlert
commands.description: To notify users when the cold chain temperature goes outside acceptable limits.

commands.name: IssueHumidityAlert
commands.description: To notify users when humidity levels deviate from safe thresholds.

commands.name: ReportColdChainFailure
commands.description: To register instances where monitoring has failed, impacting operations.

commands.name: AcknowledgeNotification
commands.description: For users to confirm that they have received and acknowledged alerts.

integrationPoints.name: UserNotificationService
integrationPoints.description: To integrate with a service that handles user notifications.

integrationPoints.name: ReportingDashboard
integrationPoints.description: To present monitoring data and alerts to users in real-time.

integrationPoints.name: AlertManagementSystem
integrationPoints.description: To manage escalation and tracking of alerts.
